ï»¿RECOMMEN)ATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the propos,?d Financing (Statistical Capacity Development Project) to the Republic of South Sudan The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International Development Associatiol (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal hat the Association extend to the Republic of South Sudan a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 5,900,003. The purpose of said credit is to strengthen the capacity of statistics producers in the territory of the Recipitnt to produce and disseminate official statistics 1. The Committee has carefully :tudied the merits of the proposal to extend such a financing, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of th. financing are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opini< n that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such financing are to be applied comes wit in the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of South Sudan and is of hig u developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of South Sudan. 3. Accordingly, the Committee fiiids that said project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project fo- such assistance.
